hero.title: My Engagement Models
hero.subtitle: I offer project-based solutions and monthly retainers, not just hourly rates. This aligns my success with your outcomes.

engagementModels.title: Project-Based Solutions
engagementModels.description: Well-defined, high-impact projects (e.g., Okta SSO integration, new API build, legacy service migration).
benefits: Fixed, transparent proposal for the entire project

engagementModels.title: Monthly Retainer (Technical Partner)
engagementModels.description: Ongoing development, team augmentation, and strategic leadership.
benefits: Dedicated block of my time each month
On-call partnership to help you scale
engagementModels.bestFor: Ongoing development, team augmentation, and strategic leadership

engagementModels.title: Strategic Audit (Paid Offering)
engagementModels.description: Teams who know they have a problem (e.g., performance, tech debt) but aren't sure where to start.
engagementModels.bestFor: Teams who know they have a problem but aren't sure where to start

services.title: Core Development
services.description: Full-stack feature development using Ruby on Rails, React, and TypeScript.

services.title: Integrations & Migrations
services.description: Architecting complex third-party API integrations (Okta, Salesforce) and leading legacy system upgrades (e.g., Ruby 2.7 to 3).

services.title: Optimization & DevOps
services.description: Performance tuning (Sidekiq, database queries), CI/CD pipelines, and implementing robust monitoring with Datadog/Prometheus.

services.title: AI & Automation
services.description: Integrating LLMs (GPT-4) to build internal tools, automate workflows, and drive developer efficiency.

services.title: Consulting & Mentoring
services.description: Acting as a senior technical leader to mentor your team, lead code reviews, and help standardize your hiring process.

steps.title: Discovery & Propose
steps.description: We deeply analyze the business problem, and I author a technical proposal or architecture plan.

steps.title: Develop
steps.description: I build the solution using agile, test-driven methodologies (TDD/BDD).

steps.title: Test & QA
steps.description: I ensure robust test coverage to maintain 99.9%+ uptime.

steps.title: Deploy & Monitor
steps.description: I manage deployment (CI/CD, Kubernetes) and watch the results (Datadog).

steps.title: Support & Iterate
steps.description: I remain your partner for future improvements.
